page.title: 14INDUSTRY - FORESTRY
page.content:
The firm of Sheffields is based at Broadfield, a large Georgian mansion complex to the East of our sector. The business is in various forms of forestry, locally and further afield. The firm manages stands of timber through all stages of their life, from planting to eventual clearing, with economic dispersal of all wood products involved. Sheffields also offers a small peripheral sales and rental service of equipment used in all branches of forestry.
Some casual labour is employed but the majority of the work is done by full-time members of staff.
